column5: O.k. Guys, just wanted to verify that this is the correct way to snell a worm rig before i start my tying frenzy lol. I used red hooks and chartreuse line for this sample just so the knot was more visible. One more question, what pound flouro should i use in general to tie up my harnesses and what should i end up with hook to hook. Im starting with 3" but if theres any suggestions why i might go smaller or larger feel free to explain. Thanks guys.
Looks like a professional job to me, and great pics taboot!
THanks for the response guys...   As soon as some more of my supplies come in, Ill be a tyin' maniac. Cheers

Nice looking job on those knots. Gotta learn how to do those myself.  I was a Scout leader for a number of years but I always had to call for past leaders assistance to do knots tying.   ..But did they ever hoot when I said "LETS GO FISHING"
